name: Rhazin Scarhide

skills.name: Bone Sword
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 20% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target.

effects.notes: 3 hits total. Damage scales with 1.5x DEF per hit.
20% chance (45% fully booked) to remove 1 random buff from target. Chance increases +10% at book 4, +15% at book 5.

skills.book_value: High priority - Damage +35% total, Buff Strip +25% (20%→45%), critical for CB/Arena debuff removal
skills.notes: Excellent for CB to maintain debuff slots and strip boss buffs. Multi-hit synergizes with Warmaster/Giant Slayer for extra procs.

skills.name: Shear
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Heavy nuke with 6x DEF multiplier. Damage +20% total when fully booked.
75% chance (100% fully booked) to place 60% Decrease DEF for 2 turns. Chance increases +10% at book 3, +15% at book 5.
75% chance (100% fully booked) to place 25% Weaken for 2 turns. Applies simultaneously with Decrease DEF.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL - Must book for 100% debuff chance and 3-turn cooldown (was 4). Essential for CB/Dungeon debuff uptime.
skills.notes: Core ability for all content. Decrease DEF + Weaken combo provides massive team damage boost. 100% uptime on 3-turn CD when booked. Priority for accuracy stacking.

skills.name: Bog Down
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Decrease the Turn Meter by 100%.

effects.notes: AOE nuke with 4x DEF multiplier. Damage +25% total when fully booked.
100% TM reduction on all enemies (requires accuracy check). Can completely reset waves in dungeons/FW. Does NOT increase Rhazin's TM.

skills.book_value: High priority - Damage +25%, Cooldown -1 turn (7→6). Essential for dungeon/FW wave control.
skills.notes: Game-changing TM control for waves. Requires high accuracy to land. Excellent for Spider, Fire Knight, and FW. Cooldown reduction critical for consistent control.

skills.name: Veteran of the Sands [P]
skills.description: Immune to [Freeze] debuffs. Heals this Champion by 7.5% of their MAX HP whenever they lose a debuff.

effects.notes: Permanent immunity to Freeze debuffs. Always active.
Heals 7.5% MAX HP whenever any debuff is removed or expires from Rhazin. Synergizes with cleanser allies and passive sustain in long fights.

skills.notes: Freeze immunity critical for Ice Golem and FW. Self-heal provides passive sustain in CB and long dungeon runs. Works with cleansers like Doompriest or Reliquary Tender.

forms.aura: Increases Ally RESIST in Arena battles by 90.
forms.comments: Rhazin is a fusion champion (Broadmaw + Torturehelm + Bloodfeather + Channeler). DEF-based kit scales exceptionally well with DEF%. Freeze immunity makes him ideal for Ice Golem. Self-heal passive provides sustain in long fights.

recommended_gear: CB 4:3 Tune: Speed (191+ SPD) + Lifesteal (sustain) + Accuracy (gloves/chest DEF%, boots SPD, all ACC subs). Alternative: Speed + Accuracy sets.
CB 3:2 Tune: Speed + Lifesteal (171 SPD breakpoint for 3:2). DEF% gloves/chest, SPD boots, ACC banner/ring/amulet subs.
Dungeons: Speed + Accuracy (or Perception) for consistent debuffs and TM control. DEF% gloves, DEF%/HP% chest, SPD boots.
Doom Tower: Speed + Accuracy + Perception (high ACC for boss mechanics). DEF%/HP% focus, SPD boots, RES substats for passive floors.
Arena Nuker: Savage + Cruel (ignore 25% DEF + bonus C.DMG). C.DMG gloves, DEF% chest, SPD boots. Requires DEF% substats and C.RATE banner.
Arena Tank: Bolster + Stoneskin (or Immortal). DEF% gloves/chest, SPD boots, RES focus. Pairs with RES aura lead.
Faction Wars: Speed + Accuracy + Perception (or any sets with ACC subs). TM control trivializes waves, prioritize ACC and SPD.

general: Warmaster is THE core T6 mastery for all content (multi-hit A1 synergy). Pinpoint Accuracy essential for 250+ ACC targets. Master Hexer optional but powerful for CB/DT debuff extension.

blessings: Phantom Touch (CB/Dungeons/DT) - Best-in-slot for CB due to 30% chance bonus Warmaster proc on multi-hit A1 = massive damage boost. Also excellent for dungeons.
Cruelty (CB/Arena) - C.DMG boost for nuke potential, secondary option if Phantom Touch unavailable.
Temporal Chains (Dungeons/FW) - Cooldown reduction for A2/A3 spam, excellent for wave control and debuff uptime.
Brimstone (Arena) - Bonus nuke damage on kills, best for Arena nuker build.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: TM Lock (Spider, Fire Knight), DEF-based 4:3 tune (CB UNM)
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info:
Spider TM Lock: Rhazin (TM control) + Coldheart/Armiger (TM reduction) + HP Burn (Ninja/Mordecai). Lock spiderlings at 0% TM, burn down Spider boss. Requires 220+ SPD, 300+ ACC.

Fire Knight TM Lock: Rhazin A3 (100% TM reduction) + multi-hitters to break shield. Prevents FK from taking turns. Requires high ACC and cooldown reduction.

Clan Boss 4:3 Tune: Rhazin at 191 SPD in Fast 4:3 comp (takes 4 turns per 3 CB turns). Maximize Warmaster procs and debuff uptime. Pairs with Deacon/Lanakis for speed boost.

Arena TM Lock: Rhazin A3 + speed booster (High Khatun) + second TM controller. Prevent enemy team from taking turns.

mechanics_advisory:
Rhazin is a top-tier DEF-based champion with exceptional versatility. Core value:

1. **Decrease DEF + Weaken combo** (A2) - Must-have debuffs for all content, enables team damage.
2. **100% AOE TM reduction** (A3) - Game-changing wave control for dungeons/FW, cheese potential for Spider/FK.
3. **DEF scaling** - All damage scales with DEF, making him both tanky and high-damage.
4. **Multi-hit A1** - Synergizes with Warmaster/Giant Slayer for extra procs, excellent for CB.
5. **Buff strip** - A1 removes buffs, critical for CB (boss buffs) and Arena (shield/unkillable comps).
6. **Freeze immunity** - Passive makes him perfect for Ice Golem and certain DT floors.
7. **Self-heal passive** - Sustain in long fights, works with cleansers.

**Fusion Info**: Rhazin is a permanent fusion (Broadmaw + Torturehelm + Bloodfeather + Channeler). One of the best fusions in the game, worth prioritizing for all accounts.

**Speed Tune Options**:
- **Fast 4:3**: 191 SPD (takes 4 turns per 3 CB turns) - Best for UNM with speed boosters.
- **Slow 4:3**: 171 SPD (alternative for slow comps).
- **Standard**: 220+ SPD for dungeons/DT/Arena.

**Synergies**:
- **CB**: Pairs with Skullcrusher (counterattack), Pain Keeper (cooldown reduction), Geomancer (HP Burn), Frozen Banshee (Poison).
- **Dungeons**: Pairs with TM controllers (Armiger, Coldheart), HP Burn (Ninja), Poison (Frozen Banshee).
- **Arena**: Pairs with speed boosters (High Khatun, Arbiter), nukers (use Rhazin A2 Decrease DEF to enable team).

**Key Stat Breakpoints**:
- 250+ ACC: Essential for debuff landing (CB/DT/Dungeons).
- 191 SPD: Fast 4:3 CB tune.
- 100% C.RATE: Maximize Warmaster procs.
- 3500+ DEF: Strong damage scaling and survivability.

**Booking Priority**: A2 FIRST (100% debuff chance + cooldown reduction), then A3 (cooldown reduction), then A1 (buff strip chance). Full books highly recommended.
